DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase 3: Efficacy Study for AMARGOL速 a phytomedicine used for asymptomatic digestive complaints.
DOC.brief_title: Protocol: Phytomedicine-AMARGOL速, Clinical Trial for Efficacy Proof on Therapeutics
DOC.detailed_description: This study will be performed for proving the efficacy of AMARGOL速, a phytomedicine product, under the Brazilian law for registration and revalidation RDC 14/2010. AMARGOL速 indications are for non specific digestive complaints as laxative and anti-dyspeptic. Is a mixture of 7 plant extracts: Aloe ferox, Angelica archangelica, Alpinia officinarum, Cinnamomum zeylanicum, Gentiana lutea, Commiphora myrrh and Rheum palmatum. Placebo controlled test
DOC.criteria: 1845 years old 6585 Kg healthy volunteers chronic dyspeptics illness chronic congestive cardiac problems pulmonary problems diabetes, thyroid problems pregnancy bowel syndrome hemorrhoids colitis allergies for any formula components.
